```{r data cleaning}
#| message: false
df <- read.csv("./Data_Raw/Midpoint data.csv", na.strings = "")
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    `Right Arm Cl` = as.numeric(Sweat.chloride..right.arm),
    `Left Arm Cl` = as.numeric(Sweat.chloride..left.arm),
    `Right Arm Na` = as.numeric(Sweat.sodium..right.arm),
    `Left Arm Na` = as.numeric(Sweat.sodium..left.arm)
  )
df$`Mean Cl` <- rowMeans(df[, c("Right Arm Cl", "Left Arm Cl")])
df$`Mean Na` <- rowMeans(df[, c("Right Arm Na", "Left Arm Na")])
```

# Plots

```{r}
ggplot(df,aes(y=`Mean Cl`))+boxplot()
```
